ARAN - YarnType
 

B

BaseYarn - Class in <Unnamed>
BaseYarn is an abstract superclass for yarn.
BaseYarn(int, int) - Constructor for class BaseYarn
is the constructor, which sets the weight and meterage of yarn in question.

C

CHUNKY - YarnType
 
Customizeable - Interface in <Unnamed>
Customizeable is an interface for Objects that need a custom value counter.
Customizer - Class in <Unnamed>
Customizer is used to customize the knitting instruction to fit the custom yarn instead of the yarn used in the instruction.
Customizer(CustomYarn, Instruction) - Constructor for class Customizer
is the constructor.
CustomYarn - Class in <Unnamed>
CustomYarn is used as the yarn to be fitted in place of the instructional yarn.
CustomYarn(int, int) - Constructor for class CustomYarn
is the constructor.

D

DEFAULT_WEIGHT_FIFTY - Static variable in class BaseYarn
DEFAULT_WEIGHT_FIFTY is a standard weight in grams for a ball or a skein of yarn.

DEFAULT_WEIGHT_HUNDRED is a standard weight in grams for a ball or a skein of yarn.
DEFAULT_WEIGHT_TWENTYFIVE - Static variable in class BaseYarn
DEFAULT_WEIGHT_TWENTYFIVE is a standard weight in grams for a ball or a skein of yarn.

G

returns the customized stitch count.

returns the gauge of the yarn.

returns the stitch count.

getWidthInCm() - Method in class Instruction
returns the width in cm.
getYarnType() - Method in class BaseYarn
returns YarnType.
getYarnType(double) - Method in class NeedleSizeRange
